verses.verse: And <S%H7126>take<s%> thou unto thee <S%H175>Aaron<s%> thy <S%H251>brother<s%>, and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> with him, from <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that he may minister unto me in the priest's <S%H3547>office<s%>, even <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, <S%H5070>Nadab<s%> and <S%H30>Abihu<s%>, <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> and <S%H385>Ithamar<s%>, <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> for <S%H175>Aaron<s%> thy <S%H251>brother<s%> for <S%H3519>glory<s%> and for <S%H8597>beauty<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto all that are <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H3820>hearted<s%>, whom I have <S%H4390>filled<s%> with the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>, that they may <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> to <S%H6942>consecrate<s%> him, that he may minister unto me in the priest's <S%H3547>office<s%>.

And these are the <S%H899>garments<s%> which they shall <S%H6213>make<s%>; a <S%H2833>breastplate<s%>, and an <S%H646>ephod<s%>, and a <S%H4598>robe<s%>, and a <S%H8665>broidered<s%> <S%H3801>coat<s%>, a <S%H4701>mitre<s%>, and a <S%H73>girdle<s%>: and they shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> for <S%H175>Aaron<s%> thy <S%H251>brother<s%>, and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, that he may minister unto me in the priest's <S%H3547>office<s%>.
And they shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H8504>blue<s%>, and <S%H713>purple<s%>, and <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> <S%H8438><s%>, and fine <S%H8336>linen<s%>.

And they shall <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H646>ephod<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, of <S%H8504>blue<s%>, and of <S%H713>purple<s%>, of <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> <S%H8438><s%>, and fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen<s%>, with <S%H2803>cunning<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%>.
It shall have the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3802>shoulderpieces<s%> thereof <S%H2266>joined<s%> at the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7098>edges<s%> thereof; and so it shall be joined <S%H2266>together<s%>.

And the curious <S%H2805>girdle<s%> of the <S%H642>ephod<s%>, which is upon it, shall be of the same, according to the <S%H4639>work<s%> thereof; even of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, of <S%H8504>blue<s%>, and <S%H713>purple<s%>, and <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> <S%H8438><s%>, and fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen<s%>. curious: or, embroidered
And thou shalt <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7718>onyx<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%>, and <S%H6605>grave<s%> on them the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>:

<S%H8337>Six<s%> of their <S%H8034>names<s%> on <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%>, and the other <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H3498>rest<s%> on the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%>, according to their <S%H8435>birth<s%>.

With the <S%H4639>work<s%> of an <S%H2796>engraver<s%> in <S%H68>stone<s%>, like the <S%H6603>engravings<s%> of a <S%H2368>signet<s%>, shalt thou <S%H6605>engrave<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> with the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> them to be <S%H4142>set<s%> in <S%H4865>ouches<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> upon the <S%H3802>shoulders<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%> for <S%H68>stones<s%> of <S%H2146>memorial<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> their <S%H8034>names<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> upon his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3802>shoulders<s%> for a <S%H2146>memorial<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H4865>ouches<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>;

And <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8333>chains<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> at the <S%H4020>ends<s%>; of <S%H5688>wreathen<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%> shalt thou <S%H6213>make<s%> them, and <S%H5414>fasten<s%> the <S%H5688>wreathen<s%> <S%H8333>chains<s%> to the <S%H4865>ouches<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> of <S%H4941>judgment<s%> with <S%H2803>cunning<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%>; after the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%> thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> it; of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, of <S%H8504>blue<s%>, and of <S%H713>purple<s%>, and of <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> <S%H8438><s%>, and of fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen<s%>, shalt thou <S%H6213>make<s%> it.
<S%H7251>Foursquare<s%> it shall be being <S%H3717>doubled<s%>; a <S%H2239>span<s%> shall be the <S%H753>length<s%> thereof, and a <S%H2239>span<s%> shall be the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> thereof.

And thou shalt <S%H4390>set<s%> in it <S%H4396>settings<s%> of <S%H68>stones<s%>, even <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2905>rows<s%> of <S%H68>stones<s%>: the first <S%H2905>row<s%> shall be a <S%H124>sardius<s%>, a <S%H6357>topaz<s%>, and a <S%H1304>carbuncle<s%>: this shall be the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H2905>row<s%>. set: Heb. fill in it fillings of stone sardius: or, ruby
And the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2905>row<s%> shall be an <S%H5306>emerald<s%>, a <S%H5601>sapphire<s%>, and a <S%H3095>diamond<s%>.
And the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H2905>row<s%> a <S%H3958>ligure<s%>, an <S%H7618>agate<s%>, and an <S%H306>amethyst<s%>.

And the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H2905>row<s%> a <S%H8658>beryl<s%>, and an <S%H7718>onyx<s%>, and a <S%H3471>jasper<s%>: they shall be <S%H7660>set<s%> in <S%H2091>gold<s%> in their <S%H4396>inclosings<s%>. inclosings: Heb. fillings

And the <S%H68>stones<s%> shall be with the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%>, according to their <S%H8034>names<s%>, like the <S%H6603>engravings<s%> of a <S%H2368>signet<s%>; every <S%H376>one<s%> with his <S%H8034>name<s%> shall they be according to the <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H7626>tribes<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> upon the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> <S%H8331>chains<s%> at the <S%H1383>ends<s%> of <S%H5688>wreathen<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> upon the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and shalt <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> on the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5688>wreathen<s%> chains of <S%H2091>gold<s%> in the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> which are on the <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%>.

And the other <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5688>wreathen<s%> chains thou shalt <S%H5414>fasten<s%> in the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4865>ouches<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> them on the <S%H3802>shoulderpieces<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4136>it<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and thou shalt <S%H7760>put<s%> them upon the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> in the <S%H8193>border<s%> thereof, which is in the <S%H5676>side<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%> <S%H1004>inward<s%>.

And <S%H8147>two<s%> other <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%>, and shalt <S%H5414>put<s%> them on the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3802>sides<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%> <S%H4295>underneath<s%>, <S%H4136>toward<s%> the <S%H6440>forepart<s%> thereof, over <S%H5980>against<s%> the other <S%H4225>coupling<s%> thereof, <S%H4605>above<s%> the curious <S%H2805>girdle<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%>.

And they shall <S%H7405>bind<s%> the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> by the <S%H2885>rings<s%> thereof unto the <S%H2885>rings<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%> with a <S%H6616>lace<s%> of <S%H8504>blue<s%>, that it may be above the curious <S%H2805>girdle<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%>, and that the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> be not <S%H2118>loosed<s%> from the <S%H646>ephod<s%>.

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> of <S%H4941>judgment<s%> upon his <S%H3820>heart<s%>, when he <S%H935>goeth<s%> in unto the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place, for a <S%H2146>memorial<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H5414>put<s%> in the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> of <S%H4941>judgment<s%> the <S%H224>Urim<s%> and the <S%H8550>Thummim<s%>; and they shall be upon <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%>, when he <S%H935>goeth<s%> in <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> upon his <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H4598>robe<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%> <S%H3632>all<s%> of <S%H8504>blue<s%>.

And there shall be an <S%H6310>hole<s%> in the <S%H7218>top<s%> of it, in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> thereof: it shall have a <S%H8193>binding<s%> of <S%H707>woven<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> the <S%H6310>hole<s%> of it, as it were the <S%H6310>hole<s%> of an <S%H8473>habergeon<s%>, that it be not <S%H7167>rent<s%>.

And beneath upon the <S%H7757>hem<s%> of it thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H7416>pomegranates<s%> of <S%H8504>blue<s%>, and of <S%H713>purple<s%>, and of <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> <S%H8438><s%>, round <S%H5439>about<s%> the <S%H7757>hem<s%> thereof; and <S%H6472>bells<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H8432>between<s%> them round <S%H5439>about<s%>: hem: or, skirts

A <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H6472>bell<s%> and a <S%H7416>pomegranate<s%>, a <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H6472>bell<s%> and a <S%H7416>pomegranate<s%>, upon the <S%H7757>hem<s%> of the <S%H4598>robe<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

And it shall be upon <S%H175>Aaron<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%>: and his <S%H6963>sound<s%> shall be <S%H8085>heard<s%> when he <S%H935>goeth<s%> in unto the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and when he <S%H3318>cometh<s%> out, that he <S%H4191>die<s%> not.

And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H6731>plate<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H6605>grave<s%> upon it, like the <S%H6603>engravings<s%> of a <S%H2368>signet<s%>, <S%H6944>HOLINESS<s%> TO THE <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H7760>put<s%> it on a <S%H8504>blue<s%> <S%H6616>lace<s%>, that it may be upon the <S%H4701>mitre<s%>; upon the <S%H6440>forefront<s%> <S%H4136><s%> of the <S%H4701>mitre<s%> it shall be.

And it shall be upon <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> <S%H4696>forehead<s%>, that <S%H175>Aaron<s%> may <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the holy <S%H6944>things<s%>, which the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H6942>hallow<s%> in all their <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4979>gifts<s%>; and it shall be <S%H8548>always<s%> upon his <S%H4696>forehead<s%>, that they may be <S%H7522>accepted<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H7660>embroider<s%> the <S%H3801>coat<s%> of fine <S%H8336>linen<s%>, and thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H4701>mitre<s%> of fine <S%H8336>linen<s%>, and thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H73>girdle<s%> of <S%H7551>needlework<s%> <S%H4639><s%>.

And for <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H3801>coats<s%>, and thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> for them <S%H73>girdles<s%>, and <S%H4021>bonnets<s%> shalt thou <S%H6213>make<s%> for them, for <S%H3519>glory<s%> and for <S%H8597>beauty<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H3847>put<s%> them upon <S%H175>Aaron<s%> thy <S%H251>brother<s%>, and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> with him; and shalt <S%H4886>anoint<s%> them, and <S%H4390>consecrate<s%> <S%H3027><s%> them, and <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> them, that they may minister unto me in the priest's <S%H3547>office<s%>. consecrate: Heb. fill their hand

And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> them <S%H906>linen<s%> <S%H4370>breeches<s%> to <S%H3680>cover<s%> their <S%H1320>nakedness<s%> <S%H6172><s%>; from the <S%H4975>loins<s%> even unto the <S%H3409>thighs<s%> they shall reach: their: Heb. flesh of their nakedness reach: Heb. be

And they shall be upon <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and upon his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, when they <S%H935>come<s%> in unto the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, or when they come <S%H5066>near<s%> unto the <S%H4196>altar<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place; that they <S%H5375>bear<s%> not <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, and <S%H4191>die<s%>: it shall be a <S%H2708>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> unto him and his <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him.
